caption.p: Stratigraphic section of the west wall. ( a) West wall photograph. ( b) Corresponding profile of grids 6AD to 10AD. These profiles show the abrupt contact between units PB-8 and PB-9, which dips ~15° to the south near the southern hill (grids 6AD to 7AD). Legend defines subunits. A young organic soil caps the sequence. See Supplementary Tables S2 and S3 for further details.
